---------------------------------------
Device Type Code Sequence | (3010,002E)
---------------------------------------
:Action: Keep (K)
:Justication: [AUTO] Attribute-Module type
:Basic Profile: N/A
:In Modules:
   - ct-image [Mandatory (M)] [Required with valid value (1)]::

       <p>
        The type of the device.
       </p>
       <p>
        Only a single Item shall be included in this Sequence.
       </p>
